title: Call Screening for Pixel 3A XL in United Kingdom
content:
Dear Pixel Team,

I believe the call screening feature is presently available only for US devices. When it will be available for UK devices as I have updated the latest Phone app which says the call screening feature, but I am not getting it.

Regards,
Somok
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
